document.full_text: at least 55 fighters were killed when south sudan's army clashed with a rebel militia, a state minister said on sunday, the latest in a wave of violence across the territory ahead of its independence in july.
document.title: south sudan army and militia clash kills 55: minister
lines_and_colors: at least 55 fighters were killed when south sudan's army clashed with a rebel militia, a state minister said on sunday, the latest in a wave of violence across the territory ahead of its independence in july.
